sen.j: 尊氏は武家政権の構築に着手するが、後醍醐天皇は叡山に逃れて抵抗しており、8月の豊仁親王（光明天皇）践祚は三種の神器を欠いたままで行われた。
sen.e: Takauji started to establish a samurai government, but Emperor Godaigo escaped to Ei-zan Mountain and continued to rebel, and the accession to the throne of Imperial Prince Toyohito (Emperor Komyo) in August was performed without the Three Sacred Treasures.
